text: na yahoodee tumase kabhee raazee honevaale hai aur na eesaee jab tak ki tum anake panth par na chalane lag jao. kah do, "allaah ka maargadarshan hee vaastavik maargadarshan hai." aur yadi us gyaan ke pashchaat jo tumhaare paas aa chuka hai, tumane unakee ichchhaon ka anusaran kiya, to allaah se bachaanevaala na to tumhaara koee mitr hoga aur na sahaayak
